question.text: Which of the following is correct with respect to biofortified food?

options.text: Wheat variety, Atlas 66, having a high lysine and tryptophan content.
vitamin C enriched crop are bitter gourd, bathua, mustard, tomato
vitamin A enriched carrots, spinach, French and garden peas
iron and calcium enriched broad and lablab

solution.text: The Indian Agricultural Research Institute, New Delhi has also released several vegetable crops that are rich in vitamins and minerals, e.g., vitamin A enriched carrots, spinach, pumpkin; vitamin C enriched bitter gourd, bathua, mustard, tomato; iron and calcium-enriched spinach and bathua; and protein-enriched beans – broad, lablab, French and garden peas.
